name: The Rewind Factory
description:
You have one task: complete a software update for a company. But just as it's about to complete, everything goes wrong and you end up in a test track.


The only way out is by completing the test track. Luckily, you have gained the ability to rewind trough time and some others like wall running, dashing and sliding.



Fight your way trough the test chambers as fast as possible to get back to the computer, while also encountering problems regarding the facility, due to the instability of the facility's software.Features
  • Singleplayer / storymode

    Fight through 35 test chambers!
  • Endless mode

    Play a randomly generated test chamber!
  • Level Editor

    Make your own test chambers, or what ever you like: droppers, mini games. The possiblities are endless!
  • Workshop integration
    Download custom maps made by others, or upload your own custom maps!
  • Leaderboards
    Compete against other players for the best time in a test chamber!



Controller Support:
The game has full controller support, except for the in-game level editor, which is why it is flagged as Partial Controller Support.
